hyprwm/Hyprland

Dynamic Wayland tiling compositor

Related repos

  • Scrollable-tiling Wayland compositor with window strips and dynamic workspaces
  • Tiling window manager for macOS with column-based layouts
  • Automates Hyprland installation on Arch Linux

  • tiling window manager for Windows with virtual workspaces and keyboard shortcuts
